name: FILM 179B
title: Documentary Animation Workshop
description: A project-based production seminar in documentary animation: students learn diverse animation styles and techniques, and apply them to a documentary-animation class project. FILM 161B and FILM 170A are strongly recommended as preparation (or equivalent background). Admission by application; application materials available during the last three weeks of the preceding quarter.
class_notes: Enrollment is by application and instructor permission only. Applications and instructions can be found at this link: https://slugfilm2.ucsc.edu/secure/production_applications/ . Applications will be reviewed after the posted deadline has passed and students will be contacted directly if they are accepted into the course.
